scripts.test:links: cd src && mintlify broken-links; exitCode=$?; exit $exitCode
scripts.generate: run-s download-spec:* && run-s gen-api-pages:* && pnpm gen-mint
scripts.gen-api-pages:platform: mintlify-scrape openapi-file -o reference src/api.json | tail -n +2 > src/reference/platform.json
scripts.gen-api-pages:read: mintlify-scrape openapi-file -o reference src/read.json | tail -n +2 > src/reference/read.json
scripts.gen-api-pages:write: mintlify-scrape openapi-file -o reference src/write.json | tail -n +2 > src/reference/write.json
